name: Extra scrollbar button at bottom
description:
Adds an extra "top" button to the bottom of the scrollbar.

----------------------------------------
OTHER SCROLLBAR MODS

Scrollbar buttons at bottom (like OSX) - http://userstyles.org/styles/25537 
Scrollbar buttons at top (Reverse OSX) - http://userstyles.org/styles/25538
Remove scrollbar buttons - http://userstyles.org/styles/25540
